name: Kraken's Cradle
desc2: Equip to increase Rupture Agents' combat capabilities
phaseDescs: When the equipper's HP decreases, their <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice Sheer DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>6%</ct>, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 25s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s. When the equipper's HP falls to 50% of max HP or below, CRIT Rate increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct>.

When the equipper's HP decreases, their <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice Sheer DMG</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>7%</ct>, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 25s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s. When the equipper's HP falls to 50% of max HP or below, CRIT Rate increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>23%</ct>.

The duration of each stack is calculated separately. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s. When the equipper's HP falls to 50% of max HP or below, CRIT Rate increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>26%</ct>.

When the equipper's HP falls to 50% of max HP or below, CRIT Rate increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>29%</ct>.

The duration of each stack is calculated separately. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.
